title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 November 2016 - XWiki
content:
<systemd> has joined #xwiki  
00:28 <systemd> has quit  
01:33 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
01:46 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki

04:14 <boubou> has joined #xwiki

08:36 <ansuz> has left #xwiki  
09:04 <mflorea> has quit  
09:10 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <ClemensR> vmassol: ping about MoccaCal question received :)  I have been sick the last week but will reply Martin later today  
09:44 <vmassol> hi ClemensR  
09:44 <vmassol> hope you're better now! :)  
09:44 <vmassol> thanks for responding to my ping (I wasn't expecdting that, you do look back quite a lot in your irc history! :))  
09:54 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:18 <ClemensR> vmassol:  sorry was afk; actually I did not see your ping in irc, but the comment notification. anyway I feel better now, and respond to the comment in the evening after catching up with other stuff  
11:18 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <ol-ow2> Hi, i'm using this snippet http://snippets.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Delete+Attachment  
11:19 <ol-ow2> $mydoc.document.deleteAttachment($mydoc.getAttachment($snippet).attachment, $context.context)  
11:21 <polx> has quit  
11:21 <ol-ow2> The attachment seem deleted (doesn't don't appear in the attachment list, BUT still accessible on download URL ?  any idea about why ? vmassol, sdumitriu, mflorea gdelhumeau  
11:23 <mflorea> attachment cache maybe. $mydoc.document.deleteAttachment() is protected API, maybe it bypasses the cache  
11:24 <ol-ow2> that's mean, that i need clean the cache after delete ?  
11:25 <ol-ow2> how can i do that ? mflorea  
11:33 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:42 <Chris[m]> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <gdelhumeau> ol-ow2: try: $xwiki.wiki.flushCache($xcontext.context)  
11:47 <blabla2[m]> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <M-mouhb> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <aloisdg[m]> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <M-yflory> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <jihad[m]> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <ol-ow2> thanks gdelhumeau  
12:39 <ClemensR> has quit  
12:40 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
12:45 <polx> has quit  
14:18 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:47 <polx> has quit  
15:56 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
15:57 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
16:06 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
16:11 <Pbas> Hello, I try to debug Libreoffice export on our datacenter (I can only watch tomcat log :-( ... a nightmare! ) do you know what Trace i must set in xwiki-prefrence-logging? (i set xwikik.properties with "external office server")?  
16:11 <Pbas> When I export a page in ODT, I have a timeout  
16:12 <Pbas> (May be a wrong right access on tmp?)  
16:30 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:34 <polx> has quit  
16:47 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4#HConsistentBlogIcons the section should not be in 8.4  
16:47 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: it's only on 8.4.1  
16:47 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I added this?  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> no I did  
16:48 <vmassol> what's the question? :)  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> see the url: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4.1/Change001/WebHome?xredirect=/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4/  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> it's a change from 8.4.1  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> and it ends up here  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> and it should not  
16:48 <vmassol> the xredirect says 8.4  
16:48 <vmassol> not 8.4.1  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> yes it's the link from the 8.4 release note  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> forget the dredirect  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> just look at the locaiton  
16:50 <vmassol> so you're saying that there's a filtering bug, right?  
16:50 <vmassol> ah yes  
16:50 <vmassol> that's normal actually :)  
16:50 <vmassol> so it's indeed a bug  
16:50 <vmassol> it filters on 8.4%  
16:50 <vmassol> probably  
16:51 <vmassol> ok the bug is in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/ReleaseNotes/Code/ReleaseNotesChangesMacro?editor=object  
16:52 <vmassol> for final versions we aggregate all milestones, rcs, etc  
16:52 <vmassol> so it's coded as <version>%  
16:52 <vmassol> which is wrong  
16:52 <vmassol> the wrong line is:     #set ($versionsParameter =  "${shortVersion}%")  
16:52 <vmassol> I think it works if I use a comma-separated liset, trying  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> (sorry I'm in a call)  
16:54 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: let me know if all is still working now  
16:54 <vmassol> (it should be fixed)  
16:54 <vmassol> (but I haven't tested, need to go back to my code)  
16:54 <vmassol> (we also need a jira on the RN app to fix it there)  
16:54 <vmassol> thx  
17:09 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:14 <systemd> has quit  
17:20 <polx> has quit  
17:20 <polx> has joined #xwiki

18:00 <Slashman> has quit

18:04 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
18:10 <ClemensR> has quit  
18:14 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
18:18 <mflorea> has quit  
18:20 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:24 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: ping  
18:24 <vmassol> (btw thanks for fixing my bug earlier on! :))  
18:31 <polx> has quit  
18:33 <gdelhumeau> pong  
18:33 <vmassol> did you see my message of ealier?  
18:33 <vmassol> \*earlier  
18:34 <gdelhumeau> seems better  
18:50 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: I think we need to backport this commit in 8.4.1  
18:53 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: except if you don't have the bootstrap-select version problem in 8.4.  
19:02 <evalica> has quit  
19:07 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: not up to date with the issue  
19:08 <gdelhumeau> in master, we have a conflict betwween ckeditor that needs bootstrap-select 1.11 and administration-ui that depends en bootstrap-select 1.9.x  
19:08 <gdelhumeau> since in the web, we have 1.9 bundled  
19:08 <gdelhumeau> ckeditor cannot be installed since 1.11.x cannot be installed  
19:09 <gdelhumeau> and in the snapshots we have DW that appears  
19:09 <gdelhumeau> because it sees that ckeditor miss one dependency  
19:09 <gdelhumeau> but on stable-8.4.x I don't know  
19:09 <gdelhumeau> depends on the ckeditor version  
19:11 <Enygma`> not sure if we have the same issue on 8.4.1  
19:12 <Enygma`> since the we don`t get DW  
19:12 <Enygma`> I would prefer to leave it for 8.4.2  
19:12 <Enygma`> and see tomorrow a clean jenkins  
19:13 <Enygma`> I`m off for today  
19:18 <Enygma`> has quit  
20:11 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: ok I'll the jira issue...  
20:12 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
20:13 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/RN-24
